page.title: 06The Boat Museum, New Growth
page.content: The collection of exhibits at the Boat Museum continues to grow, and so to do the facilities provided for visitors.The cafes provide hot and cold meals. If you wish to bring your own food their are rooms and an outside picnic area. A conference centre has recently been completed and is mainly used by commerce and visiting groups. It contains a lecture theatre,2 classrooms, coffee lounge and audio visual equipment. The education service provides information and worksheets for schools. The archives have a growing collectio of old documents.
